original_title: Guns N' Roses: Makin' F@*!ing Videos Part I - Don't Cry
overview: A look behind the scenes at the making of the video for the song "Don't Cry" from Guns N Roses Use Your Illusion album from when the band was near the peak of its popularity. Inludes footage of the bandmembers hard at work in the studio, as well as in some of their more relaxed moments.
title: Guns N' Roses: Makin' F@*!ing Videos Part I - Don't Cry
